## HoldState enum

Determines the hold state of the device, for the current call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum HoldState 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  NO\_ONGOING\_CALLS | <code>&quot;no-ongoing-calls&quot;</code> | The device cannot be on hold, as there are no active calls. |
|  NOT\_ON\_HOLD | <code>&quot;not-on-hold&quot;</code> | The device assumes the current call is not on hold, i.e. is in progress. |
|  ON\_HOLD | <code>&quot;on-hold&quot;</code> | The device assumes the current call is on hold. |
